name: dmmpt
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: 3eqtri(cdm(c0), crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)), crn(ccnv(c0)), cima(ccnv(c0), universe))
stmt.pretty: 3eqtri(dom(c0), { s0 ∈ c1 | c2 ∈ 𝕌 }, ran(`' c0), (`' c0 " 𝕌))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cdm(c0), crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)))
-| wceq(cdm(c0), crn(ccnv(c0)))
-| wceq(crn(ccnv(c0)), cima(ccnv(c0), universe))
-| wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), universe), crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cdm(c0), crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)))
-| wceq(cdm(c0), crn(ccnv(c0)))
-| wceq(crn(ccnv(c0)), cima(ccnv(c0), universe))
-| wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), universe), crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)))

|- wceq(cdm(c0), crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)))
-| wceq(crn(ccnv(c0)), cima(ccnv(c0), universe))
-| wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), universe), crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)))

|- wceq(cdm(c0), crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)))
-| wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), universe), crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cima(ccnv(c0), universe), crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)))
-| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
-| diffsc(s0, universe)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cdm(c0), crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)))
-| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
-| diffsc(s0, universe)

|- wceq(cdm(c0), crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)))
-| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))

comment: The domain of the mapping operation in general. (Contributed by NM, 16-May-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Mar-2015.)
